entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
